title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations:

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the percentage of White teens who mostly disagree with their parents.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the difference between Black and Hispanic teens on whether they agree with their parentsâ€™ political views.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion that explains how political socialization affects that difference described in part (B).

For Task D, the response correctly explains how the methods used to gather data in the bar graph reflect scientific polling practices.
